Year: # ### Quantization

Title: HACK: Homomorphic Acceleration via Compression of the Key-Value Cache for Disaggregated LLM Inference
Tags: method without dequantization; homomorphic quantization method for matrix multiplication; requantization elimination

Title: Bitnet.cpp: Efficient Edge Inference for Ternary LLMs
Tags: ternary mpGEMM library; avoid intricate bit-level manipulations; achieving lossless inference for BitNet b1.58

Title: MILLION: Mastering Long-Context LLM Inference Via Outlier-Immunized KV Product Quantization
Tags: a non-uniform quantization algorithm based on product quantization; leverages sparse computation and asynchronous quantization; distributes quantization power unevenly across channels

Title: 70% Size, 100% Accuracy: Lossless LLM Compression for Efficient GPU Inference via Dynamic-Length Float
Tags: dynamic-length float; preserving bit-for-bit identical outputs; BFloat16 exponents carry significantly less information than their allocated bit width

Title: DyBit: Dynamic Bit-Precision Numbers for Efficient Quantized Neural Network Inference
Tags: adaptive data representation with variablelength encoding; hardware-aware quantization framework
